name: Display Post Types – Post Grid, post list and post sliders
author: vedathemes

sections.description:
Easily display post grid, list or post sliders. Display post types provides easiest way to fetch, sort and display list of posts, pages or any custom post types using block or widget.

Display Post Types is the ultimate solution for crafting visually stunning grids, lists or sliders on your website! Whether you want to showcase blogs, portfolio, or any other content, Display Post Types is here to make it happen effortlessly.

This user-friendly plugin empowers you to create captivating grids with just a few clicks, thanks to its intuitive Shortcode, Editor Block and WordPress Widget. It is also fully responsive and mobile-friendly, ensuring your grids look amazing on all devices.

With Display Post Types, you can effortlessly present your posts in grid, list, and masonry views, all without any coding knowledge required. Choose from a variety of pre-made layouts to kickstart your design process, or customize to your heart’s content.

We have created a quick walk through video to easily get started with Display Post Types.

What this plugin offers

  • Fetch any post, page or post types using available filters and sort your selection.
  • Choose what content items to be displayed (from available options)
  • Choose a style to display your content. You can choose from list, grid or slider views. Variuos customization options
  • Live preview of your changes in the display post types block.

Need more layouts and customization options?

  • Get more features, layouts and customization options with Display Post Types Pro
  • Check sample layouts made possible by Display Post Types Pro.
  • Option to display custom fields and shortcodes in the display post types.
  • Get Display Post Types Pro

Setup DPT Widget

Display post types in any widget area of your website.

  1. After activating the plugin, visit Appearance > Widgets in admin dashboard.
  2. Look for ‘Display Post Types’ widget in left ‘Available Widgets’ section.
  3. Drag the widget to any available sidebar/widget area.
  4. Select a post type to be displayed.
  5. Select various filter, sort and styling options to make a unique layout.
  6. Click [Save] button.

Setup DPT Block

Display post types list on any post or page using editor block. Make sure you have not disabled WordPress latest block editor.

Setup

  1. After activating the plugin, visit any post or page’s edit screen.
  2. In main content area, click on ‘+’ icon to add a new block.
  3. Search for ‘Display Post Types’ block or Select from “Layout Elements > Display Post Types”.
  4. Select a post type to be displayed.
  5. Select various filter, sort and styling options to make a unique layout.
  6. Click [Publish] or [Update] button.
sections.installation:
Installing “Display Post Types” can be done either by searching for “Display Post Types” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
2.7.0

2.6.2

  • Error Fix: PHP deprication notice error fix in class-options.php
  • Add: Update readme.txt and credit.txt.

2.6.1

  • Error Fix: Minor error fix for older versions of PHP.

2.6.0

  • Support for DPT shortcode.

2.5.0

  • Add: Added option to set custom image aspect ratio.
  • Add: Set text position on image.

2.4.1

  • Error Fix: DPT thumbnail display error fix.

2.4.0

  • Modify: Error fixes and code improvements.

2.3.0

  • Modify: Optimization in scripts and style for better loading performance.
  • Modify: Rearrange editor block and widget options for better understanding.
  • Modify: Added video instructions to get started with this plugin.

2.2.0

  • Error Fix: Masonry layout height error.
  • Error Fix: Bricklayer script updation.
  • Error Fix: DPT styling issues.
  • Error Fix: Disable DPT block in edit screen for better editing UX.
  • Modify: DPT block UI improvement.
  • Compatibility with WordPress 6.3

2.1.0

  • Error Fix: Screen resize compatibility with slider.
  • Error Fix: Remove extra backslash from assets (CSS and JS) URL.
  • Error Fix: Widget specific JS errors.
  • Modify: Improved widget and block components and workflow.
  • Add: Options to modify meta information.

2.0.0

  • Error Fix: Compatibility with WP 5.8
  • Modify: Optimized frontend JS loading.
  • Modify: Code improvements

1.9.0

  • Error Fix: show display style for pages
  • Error Fix: Show number of items option for pages
  • Modify: Implement PHP autoload
  • Modify: Structural changes in PHP codebase

1.8.0

  • Add: Option to show post pagination.
  • Add: Elementor compatibility.
  • Edit: CSS and JS improvements.

1.7.0

  • Error Fix: Correct slider interval time error on DPT block.
  • Error Fix: Disable with WP 5.5 lazy load for masonry layouts.
  • Modify: Code changes in widget form markup method.
  • Modify: JS and CSS resource loading optimization.

1.6.0

  • Error Fix: Exclude self from the fetch post query
  • Error Fix: Container aware responsiveness
  • Error Fix: Remove arrow icon from excerpt teaser text
  • Add: Auto slide with wait time option

1.5.0

  • Error Fix: Remove excerpt length limitation from DPT block.
  • Error Fix: Remove on text from date meta.
  • Modify: Change DPT title heading tag from H2 to H3
  • Modify: Comply with latest WP coding standards
  • Modify: Minor code improvements
  • Add: Add AND/OR relationship option for Terms selection

1.4.0

  • Error Fix: Wrap DPT in a div wrapper to make compatible with Twenty Twenty theme
  • Error Fix: Excerpt length default value
  • Error Fix: Slider button position left or right with modified Horizontal gutter
  • Add: Display Posts offset option
  • Modify: Minor styling error fix and improvements.

1.3.0

  • Modify: Get custom excerpt if available instead of main content.
  • Modify: Test with WordPress 5.4
  • Modify: Change minimum WP requirements to WP 4.9

1.2.0

  • Error Fix: Support block editor className attribute.

1.1.0

  • Error Fix: DPT compatibility with IE11 (Javascript errors).
  • Error Fix: Excerpt and Gutter options not working in DPT widget.

1.0.1

  • Error Fix: Unexpected excerpt options display in DPT widget.

1.0.0

  • First version.

sections.reviews:
cool Guy, good Plugin!

By dbase66 on March 30, 2024

One of best Plugins

happy with this plug-ins

By reb00t on March 28, 2024

Does the job and haven't found any problem with it.

Exactly What I Needed to Display Custom Post Types

By dragonvain on March 9, 2024

The Display Post Types plugin has been an absolute game-changer for me in showcasing content in a dynamic and visually appealing way. This versatile plugin made it super easy to create shortcodes and display any type of post, from articles and portfolio pieces to testimonials, in a list, grid, or slider format. I needed a way to display custom post types, and this plugin is exactly what I needed. Thanks!

perfecta

By crelma on January 12, 2024

Muy fàcil de usar. Aunque no puedes personalizar todos los aspectos tiene suficientes recursos y hace su función perfectamente.

Perfect

By bmrtrek on November 22, 2023

The best post plugin for me! Everything is done in the editor, no shortcodes, you can display any list of posts or pages, unique! After a long period without updates, DPT is back, great!

Excellente !!

By Leandro (hootero) on July 27, 2022

Excellent plugin! I love it !!! But, please we need you to update it. The last update was a year ago, and I don't want to stop using it.

Awesome plugin but ...

By Kenn Chin (kennchin) on August 1, 2021

Awesome. Nice, Simple & Elegant. Thank you. One request please. Remove or option to hide dots on mobile. Dots not showing on desktop, laptop & tablet. Increasing number of posts result in multiple rows of dots. Kindly consider.

Fantastic!!! 10/10!

By HitsukiEri on July 20, 2021

It does everything paid plugins do and in a more flexible, efficient and lightweight way! My custom posts worked PERFECTLY as a Gutenburg block, Elementor block, AND as a widget! No shortcodes, no extra layer of GUI, NO MESS! Simple and perfect! This plugin is ALSO responsive, just can't describe how perfect this is!! I would give this 10/5. Really excited to see what this developer will develop next!!!

The simplicity of this plugin is great!

By Tim in Seattle (TheFrameGuy) on April 14, 2021

This is the Gutenberg plugin I've been looking for. One addition that would be nice would be the ability to link to custom fields.

Nice plugin for showing posts finally

By Alex (AlexMnrs) on November 15, 2020

Finally I found a nice plugin for showing posts!! I can't use it only for one reason: no pagination available. My idea is to show 9 posts and then the pagination right below so they can go to the next page and load the next 9. I'm currently using WP Show Posts and it does the job, but it's not that customizable like this one. If you can add an option to show pagination I'd love to use this awesome plugin. Or if you have any suggestions to do it in any other way it would be nice. My theme is Generate Press (paid version).

short_description: Display list of posts, pages or any custom post types anywhere using block and widget. Show as grid, list or posts slider.
